thread.section_title: McElhinneys Department Store Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of McElhinneys Department Store | mcelhinneys.com
thread.title: Anita Maune
thread.title_full: McElhinneys Department Store reviewed by Anita Maune

author: Anita Maune
title: Anita Maune
text:
I found this site very well laid out and it was super easy to navigate which meant finding what I was looking for took no time at all.
I was anxious to get my item as it was a present for a special friend of mine who had just had a baby and to say a speedy service provided would be putting it mildly.
I placed my order on Monday and received it Wednesday of the same week in sturdy packaging and with very simple instructions enclosed as to how to return my purchase if I was not satisfied, but I was more than happy with my whole experience, will most definitely be ordering from them again.Happy shopping!!ðŸ˜‰
